definition: a variety of cattle produced by crossbreeding with a superior breed, determine the grade of or assign a grade to
details:
noun
- a variety of cattle produced by crossbreeding with a superior breed
- the gradient of a slope or road or other surface
= example: the gradient of a slope or road or other surface
- a position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality
= example: a position on a scale of intensity or amount or quality
= synonyms: level
- the height of the ground on which something stands
= example: the height of the ground on which something stands
= synonyms: ground level
- a number or letter indicating quality (especially of a student's performance)
= synonyms: mark
- a degree of ablaut
= synonyms: gradation
- a body of students who are taught together
= synonyms: form
- one-hundredth of a right angle
= synonyms: grad
- a relative position or degree of value in a graded group
= example: a relative position or degree of value in a graded group
= synonyms: level
verb
- determine the grade of or assign a grade to
- assign a grade or rank to, according to one's evaluation
= example: assign a grade or rank to, according to one's evaluation
= synonyms: mark
- assign a rank or rating to
= synonyms: place
- level to the right gradient
